title: Mrs Black Dyamond on Why She’s the Queen of Compton
description:
The Queen of Compton aka Black Dyamond talks about her come up, trials and tribulations in her personal life, hating the politics of battle rap, beef with battle rapper Coffee and more! ----- 00:00 Intro 1:46 Diz and Dyamond battled for Drake's birthday as Drake's bday surprise 4:28 Dyamond was going through it when she performed for Drake 8:11 Dyamond gave the Queen of Compton title to herself 13:30 Working with DW Flame 15:30 Dyamond hates the battle rap world and the politics behind it 18:00 Some people hate her without knowing her or even meeting her 20:40 Coffee has beefs with everyone in LA, she also beefed with S.O. Finesse who's Dyamond's homegirl 23:38 Dyamond gives her break down on the whole Coffee beef situation 24:47 S/O Viixen The Assassin 25:14 Back to the beef, Coffee jumped out the window talkin about “F*ck Crack city! F*ck them b*tches" 27:11 They ended up fighting outside the County Building 34:29 Big announcement, Dyamond is coming back in the ring with her homie Dre Vishiss for a two on two 41:36 "They used to say if you don't battle with URL you ain't sh*t” 42:00 "The West run battle rap right now" 43:00 Battle rap unifies different g*ng members: "Battle rap keeps up respectful" ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps! ORDER YOUR FREE SAMPLE TODAY with our Promo Code NoJumper https://youtu.be/UUwcj1YC-NE Gamer Supps offers esports athletes, gamers, and podcasters the most effective and healthy energy choice to help them perform at the highest potential, especially during their most crucial moments.
